thread.title: Jason Squig McCrory
thread.title_full: B&H Photo-Video reviewed by Jason Squig McCrory

author: Jason Squig McCrory
title: Jason Squig McCrory
text: I am a creature of habit and I usually know exactly what I want to purchase when I enter the store or visit their website. If I ever have any reservations on the product(s) I am purchasing, they provide quick online support to answer any questions that I may have. B&H is always my first choice with purchasing my photography equipment.
